connectors/README.title: Connectors
connectors/README.description: DNIF provides various connectors to integrate with different data sources and platforms. This section documents the setup and configuration of these connectors.

data-ingestion/syslog.title: Syslog Data Ingestion
data-ingestion/syslog.description: DNIF supports ingesting logs from various devices and applications using the Syslog protocol. This guide explains how to configure Syslog data ingestion in DNIF.

device-integration/README.title: Device Integration
device-integration/README.description: DNIF supports integration with various security devices and platforms. This section provides detailed documentation for integrating different devices with DNIF.

dql-language/overview.title: DNIF Query Language (DQL) Overview
dql-language/overview.description: DQL is a powerful query language designed specifically for security analytics and log analysis in DNIF. This guide provides an overview of DQL and its capabilities.

hunting-with-workbooks/getting-started/c.title: Creating Workbooks
hunting-with-workbooks/getting-started/c.description: Workbooks in DNIF allow you to create custom security investigations and threat hunting scenarios. This guide explains how to create and configure workbooks.

operations/collection-status.title: Collection Status Monitoring
operations/collection-status.description: DNIF provides comprehensive tools for monitoring the status of your log collection and data ingestion. This guide explains how to monitor and manage collection status.

security-monitoring/signal-suppression.title: Signal Suppression
security-monitoring/signal-suppression.description: Signal suppression in DNIF allows you to manage and control alert noise by suppressing specific signals based on defined rules. This guide explains how to configure and manage signal suppression.

user-management/authentication.title: Authentication and Access Control
user-management/authentication.description: DNIF provides comprehensive authentication and access control mechanisms to secure your SIEM platform. This guide explains the authentication methods and how to configure them.

user-management/tenant-management.title: Tenant Management
user-management/tenant-management.description: DNIF supports multi-tenant architecture, allowing you to manage multiple organizations or departments within a single instance. This guide explains how to manage tenants in DNIF.

user-management/user-management.title: User Management
user-management/user-management.description: DNIF provides comprehensive user management capabilities to help you manage users, roles, and permissions effectively. This guide explains how to manage users in DNIF.
